label: 三宅尚斎
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1662-1741) [Along with Satō Naokata and Asami Keisai, he] came to be known as the three exemplars of the Ansai school (kimon sanketsu), and their teaching exerted a substantial influence on society (p. 420). [佐藤直方、浅見絅斎、崎門三傑]
